full_summary: ## Supply Arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS - Procurement Specialist - Junior ### Tenders in French are first, then English. #### OBSOLETE -Supply Arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS - TSPS Mandatory PSIB Set-Aside Stream 3- Project Management Services - Stream 3 - Category 3.7 Procurement Specialist – Junior MODIFIÉ - Arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement E60ZT-18TSPS SPTS - Mise en jachère facultative à la SAEA Volet 3 - Services de gestion de projets - Catégorie 3.7 Spécialiste en approvisionnement - Junior **Table of Content** 1. [General Information](#General-Information) 2. [Tender Details](#Tender-Details) 3. [Contact Information](#Contact-Information) ### General Information This is a tender notice of amendment to a pre-existing supply arrangement. ### Tender Details * **Reference Number:** 81098-3440340 * **Amendment Number:** 9 * **Solicitation Number:** 92413-22-0010 * **Publication Date:** 2023-04-12 * **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-27 14:00:00 * **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-11 * **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-07-10 * **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement * **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering * **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price ### Contact Information * **Person Responsible for the Notice:** Erin Ort * **Email:** erina.ort@cer-rec.gc.ca * **Phone Number:** (403) 626-3126 * **Address:** 5678 5th Avenue NW, Calgary, AB T2K 1W3 ### Additional Resources * Attachments - Amended Contract - Tender Notice - Mandatory Documents * Note: Full Solicitation Document may be accessible through: [Canadian Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) You must now
